title: Thar
writer: Anthony Catino, Raj Singh Chaudhary, Yogesh Ishwar
short_cast: Anil Kapoor, Harshvarrdhan Kapoor, Fatima Sana Shaikh, Satish Kaushik, Jitendra Joshi, Sanjay Bishnoi, Sanjay Dadhich, Mukti Mohan

desc: A veteran cop sees the chance to prove himself when murder and a stranger's grisly torture plot shake the walls of a sleepy desert town.
